meta.description: PC creation gate. If created=false, the GM MUST run Session Zero before play proceeds.

pc.name: Eltric Stagborne
pc.high_concept: Last of the Noble Stagborne Clan - Champion of Ulfric
other_aspects: Sworn to Kyne, Bound to Falkreath
pc.starting_role: Riding in to meet Ulfric, Galmar, and Ralof at the Whiterun staging line; front-line champion and disciplined Thu'um support.
stunts: Thu'um Prodigy: +2 when using Will for Shouts (4dF).
Nobleman's Diplomacy: +2 Rapport with Jarls/Housecarls/Stewards/aristocratic Nords in formal contexts.
Stag-Rush CHARGE: Once per scene move two zones; gain +2 Fight or +2 Physique (declare before moving).
The Stagborne Estate: +2 when using Resources to Overcome to organize Skyrim's aristocratic militia, stewards, and political zeitgeist in Stormcloak-controlled territory.
extras: The Thu'um: Unrelenting Force, Kyne's Peace, Disarm
Elder Elk's Edge (Artifact Axe) — see modules/extras/ELDER_ELK_EDGE_ARTIFACT.md
pc.notes:
Faction: Stormcloak (Champion of the War). Background: former monk of High Hrothgar; vows strained by Falkreath's blood debt.

MAJOR MILESTONE: Skill cap raised to +5. Fight +5. Will +4. High Concept rewritten; earned title Champion of Ulfric after Whiterun Gatehouse.
pc.racial_trait: Children of the Snow, Voices of War (+2 Will vs cold/fear/intimidation; 1/session use Will for Fight/Physique; Thu'um creates Echo of Kyne boost)
pc.standing_stone: Warrior Stone (+1 physical Overcome/CreateAdvantage; 1/session +2 Warrior’s Surge)
